IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: TO DISTRIBUTE FUNDS RECEIVED FROM THE GRAND FALLS CASINO & RESORT TO QUALIFIED NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS INCLUDING COUNTY, MUNICIPALITIES AND SCHOOL DISTRICTS IN ACCORDANCE WITH IOWA CODE.
IRS990.MissionDesc: TO DISTRIBUTE FUNDS RECEIVED FROM THE GRAND FALLS CASINO & RESORT TO QUALIFIED NON-PROFIT ORGANIZATIONS INCLUDING COUNTY, MUNICIPALITIES AND SCHOOL DISTRICTS IN ACCORDANCE WITH IOWA CODE.
IRS990.Desc: THE FOUNDATION DISTRIBUTES 50% OF ITS ANNUAL NET RECEIPTS TO THE INCORPORATED MUNICIPAL CITIES, COUNTY GOVERNMENT, AND SCHOOL DISTRICTS DISTRICTS IN LYON COUNTY.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: THE FOUNDATION DISTRIBUTES 50% OF ITS NET ANNUAL NET RECEIPTS IN THE FORM OF GRANTS AND SCHOLARSHIPS TO QUALIFIED NON-PROFIT ORGAINIZATIONS. THESE COMPETTITIVE GRANTS ARE AWARDED ON AN APPLICATION PROCESS.

RecipientBusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: LITTLE ROCK FIRE DEPT AND EMS

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Grantmaker's Description of How Grants are Used
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION REQUIRES GRANTEES TO PROVIDE PROOF OF PAYMENT INCLUDING A CANCELLED CHECK AND INVOICE AS SUPPORT TO MONITOR THAT THE GRANTS ARE BEING USED FOR THE PURPOSE APPLIED FOR.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE GOVERNING BODY RELIES ON THE PRESIDENT TO REVIEW THE FORM 990 FOR LYON COUNTY RIVERBOAT FOUNDATION, INC

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FOUNDATION IS DILIGENT IN REVIEWING ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST ISSUES BY CLOSE REVIEW OF ALL TRANSACTIONS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS SETS THE WAGE POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS SETS THE WAGE POLICY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ALL INFORMATION IS AVAILABLE TO THE PUBLIC BY VISITING THE FOUNDATION'S OFFICE IN ROCK RAPIDS, IOWA.
